0: Staff is very courteous and helpful and amenities are top notch
Nice bar area with live music
Nice place to stay but terrible for parking
Great deal on a super nice hotel
On our request they brought an extra bed duvet and they allowed us to move the next morning and were very helpful to accommodate
The front desk was so helpful and attentive
They also were very helpful with getting us extras of whatever we needed with amenities
1: I spend about 5 months yearly in hotels due to work and most are limiting the pool hours for under 18
I reached out to The hotel and spoke to Luis who told me he would resolve it and if I did not see it by Wednesday to call him back
Breakfast was buffet but they did not keep food fresh and could not get waited on
parking and loading and unloading not enough carts for luggage
The pillows are hard and uncomfortable
We requested a microwave which was delivered to our room promptly
We could hear the conversation of the people in the next room as clear as if we were sitting across from them
Found lots of dirt and dust behind and around the bed area
The rug in the entrance to the hotel was dirty not a good first impression
The pool did not work the hot tub was out
